about_the_game:
Boost your pilot collection with this set of pilots, plus added extras for FREE!

Please note: if you already own a pilot from this set, you will be rewarded with a duplicate consolation prize. So feel free to use this pack to fill out any holes in your pilot lineup!

This DLC Pack contains:

500 Coins
15 Pilots
  • Hooty
  • Puggles
  • Astro Cat
  • Crossy Chicken
  • Vlad
  • Bargain Hunter
  • Blitzen
  • Sweet Beets
  • Captain Pugglewash
  • Ghostblin
  • Star Invader
  • Elephunk
  • Wombatman
  • Mr Sunshine
  • Cross Buns
detailed_description:
Boost your pilot collection with this set of pilots, plus added extras for FREE!

Please note: if you already own a pilot from this set, you will be rewarded with a duplicate consolation prize. So feel free to use this pack to fill out any holes in your pilot lineup!

This DLC Pack contains:

500 Coins
15 Pilots
  • Hooty
  • Puggles
  • Astro Cat
  • Crossy Chicken
  • Vlad

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+, SteamOS+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+, SteamOS+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 970 4GB VRAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.9
  • Processor: Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.13
  • Processor: Discreet Nvidia or AMD GPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows7 +
  • Processor: 64bit
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: 64bit
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 970 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
